Html:
Firstly, may I thank you for a fantastic rendition of the Vancouver style for Word.

I have a title for a journal article that uses the < symbol (eg "children <1 year old"). When creating the bibliography, the reference stops at the < symbol and inverts it, not including any further data.

Is there a way of preventing this?

 

Thanks,

Sion
I haven't had a chance to try this myself, but try replacing < with < in the title and see if that works.
